Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの娘たち？
Entry.EnglishText: You're looking for Huma girls?

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ……そういうのは 見てないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I haven't seen anything of the sort...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、前から思ってたんだけど、 ガジュマの女の子って、どこを どう見ると、カワイイかどうか わかるのかしらね……
Entry.EnglishText: I've always wondered what one would consider cute about Gajuma girls...

Entry.JapaneseText: 美しいって言葉は、 ヒューマにしか使うべきじゃ ないと思うわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I think only Huma can be considered beautiful...

Entry.JapaneseText: 冒険家のフランツとかいう人が、 登山洞に入って行ったわ。
Entry.EnglishText: An adventurer named Frantz went into the Climbers' Cavern.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、そこに<Blue>幻<White>の 何かがあるんですって。
Entry.EnglishText: He said that there is some sort of <Blue>Illusion<White> in there.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、前から思ってたんだけど、 ガジュマの女の子って、どこを どう見ると、カワイイかどうか わかるのかしらね……
Entry.EnglishText: I've always wondered what one would consider cute about Gajuma girls...

Entry.JapaneseText: 美しいって言葉は、 ヒューマにしか使うべきじゃ ないと思うわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I think only Huma can be considered beautiful...

Entry.JapaneseText: あのガジュマたちと来たら、 祭司様を殺そうとしたのよ！ 許せないでしょ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma came and tried to kill the priest! That's unforgivable, right!?

Entry.JapaneseText: まだガジュマたちとの間に 少しギクシャクしたものが 残ってるの……
Entry.EnglishText: I still feel that there's some awkwardness between us and the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: そのうち、なんとかなれば いいけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope we can get over it...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだガジュマたちとの間に 少しギクシャクしたものが 残ってるの……
Entry.EnglishText: I still feel that there's some awkwardness between us and the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私にも原因があるの…… でも、割り切れない部分も あるから……ねぇ……
Entry.EnglishText: Even I have my reasons... There are some things that just don't have easy solutions...

Entry.JapaneseText: 山が……崩れて来ないかしら!? 蒼獣様にお祈りしなきゃ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Th-The mountain isn't going to collapse, is it? I-I need to pray to the Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こるの？ 大嵐？ 大地震？ ああ、蒼獣様……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What's happening!? A storm? An earthquake!? Oh... Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここをずーっと まっすぐ登って行けば 蒼獣様の聖殿よ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you keep climbing, you'll reach the Azure Beast's Sanctuary!

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Right, the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... She can't talk to me because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that she can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh...the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right, those commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: He isn't allowed to talk to women because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
